image.alt: Bright, modern Hansen Orthodontics reception and treatment area with welcoming lighting

paragraphs.text: At Hansen Orthodontics & Aesthetics, we believe a confident smile has the power to transform how you see yourself and how the world sees you. We combine precision, artistry, and modern technology to deliver personalized orthodontic and aesthetic care for children, teens, and adults—tailoring every treatment to your lifestyle and long‑term oral health. Your journey to a healthier, more confident smile begins with a consultation and care centered on comfort, trust, and outstanding results.

items.title: VIP Experience
items.text: Treatment plans customized to your dental anatomy, lifestyle, and goals for predictable, long‑lasting results.

items.title: Advanced Technology
items.text: CBCT imaging, intraoral digital scanning, and 3D printing for precise diagnosis and more comfortable treatment.

items.title: Airway Care
items.text: We treat alignment and airway concerns that affect sleep and overall health, integrating airway‑focused care when appropriate.

items.title: Comfortable Office
items.text: A modern, family‑centered practice with an emphasis on patient comfort and a five‑star patient experience.

Home.title: Meet Dr. Nathan Hansen, DDS, MS

paragraphs.text: Dr. Nathan Hansen is passionate about blending science, art, and heart into every smile he creates. Born in El Paso and raised in the Kansas suburbs, he trained at Creighton and Saint Louis University and completed advanced mentorships in smile aesthetics and airway‑focused care. He brings a patient‑first approach and meticulous attention to detail to every treatment plan.

image.alt: Dr. Nathan Hansen, orthodontist at Hansen Orthodontics & Aesthetics

paragraphs.text: We offer modern options for every smile, from clear aligners to braces, retainers, and professional whitening to help you achieve and keep your best results.

image.alt: Spark Clear Aligners held in a hand, clear aligner treatment
Damon Braces close-up on teeth
Custom retainers on a dental tray
Professional teeth whitening treatment

testimonials.author: Paulina Longenbaugh
testimonials.testimonial: “Dr. Hansen is an amazing doctor. I really appreciate the time that he takes to explain the procedure to me. He’s patient and helps me to feel comfortable asking questions. ... His office is one of the most beautiful buildings I’ve been in.”

testimonials.author: David Peterson
testimonials.testimonial: “As a fellow orthodontist I can’t speak more highly of Dr Hansen and his wife Amy. Dr. Hansen is passionate, honest, and very detail oriented. ... He is an incredible orthodontist that you can trust to create your dream smile.”

testimonials.author: Hannah Minall
testimonials.testimonial: “Dr. Hansen was absolutely fantastic! While traveling from out of town, we had an unexpected orthodontic emergency with my teen, and he went above and beyond to help us. His kindness and professionalism were truly reassuring ...”

testimonials.author: Veronica Macias Santos
testimonials.testimonial: “Great Experience! I’m getting braces in Mexico, but a bracket broke while I was in El Paso. Hansen Orthodontics got me in the next day and fixed it quickly. Super helpful, professional, and kind—highly recommend!”

image.alt: Parents with kids relaxing in front of home
Family enjoying time together outdoors

og_meta.title: Home - Hansen Orthodontics & Aesthetics
og_meta.description: Modern, patient-centered orthodontic care in El Paso: Spark clear aligners, Damon braces, retainers, and professional whitening.

image.alt: Bright, modern orthodontic office reception and team area at Hansen Orthodontics & Aesthetics

paragraphs.text: At Hansen Orthodontics & Aesthetics we’re more than a dental practice — we’re a team of passionate professionals committed to crafting confident smiles that change lives. As a family-centered practice, we build strong relationships with patients and the community and design personalized treatment plans that align with each patient's lifestyle, goals, and long-term dental health.

Our Mission: To deliver transformative orthodontic and aesthetic care through innovation, expertise, and an unwavering commitment to excellence. Your journey to a radiant, confident smile starts with us.

image.alt: Dr. Nathan Hansen headshot smiling at Hansen Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: Transforming Smiles. Inspiring Confidence. Dr. Nathan Hansen blends science, art, and heart into every smile he creates. Born in El Paso and raised in the Kansas suburbs, Dr. Hansen returned home to serve the community with world-class orthodontic care and a personal touch.
He builds treatment plans that respect each patient's lifestyle and long-term dental health, focusing on clear communication, comfort, and predictable results.

image.alt: Dr. Nathan Hansen in clinical setting

paragraphs.text: Dr. Hansen earned his bachelor’s degree in Spanish from Brigham Young University, completed his DDS at Creighton University School of Dentistry where he graduated near the top of his class and received the Spirit of Creighton Award, and finished his orthodontic residency at Saint Louis University with a Master of Science in Dental Science.

image.alt: Dr. Hansen portrait

paragraphs.text: Dr. Hansen focuses on orthodontics for children, teens, and adults, offering both braces and clear aligner options. His clinical interests include airway-focused orthodontics, smile aesthetics, and facial-focused treatment planning to deliver healthy, balanced results.

image.alt: Dr. Hansen consulting with a patient
Dr. Hansen at a professional event

paragraphs.text: Dr. Hansen completed a two-year Advanced Orthodontic Treatment & Smile Aesthetics Master Class and benefited from two years of mentorship under Dr. Stuart Frost and Dr. Trevor Nichols. These advanced studies sharpen his skills in facial aesthetics and contemporary orthodontic techniques.

image.alt: Dr. Hansen with mentors and colleagues

paragraphs.text: Outside clinical practice Dr. Hansen brings athleticism and creativity to life — a background in acrobatics, tricking, and team performance informs his energetic, patient-centered approach to care.

image.alt: Dr. Hansen active and community-minded

items.name: Amy Whitesides
items.bio: Amy leads patient coordination and ensures every visit runs smoothly. Learn more on her profile page.

image.alt: Amy Whitesides smiling in the office

items.name: Clinical & Administrative Team
items.bio: Our clinical and administrative staff work together to create a welcoming, professional experience for every patient.

image.alt: Clinical and administrative team at Hansen Orthodontics

items.name: Support Team
items.bio: Our assistants and coordinators support every stage of treatment, from first consults to final retainers.

image.alt: Support team members at Hansen Orthodontics

slides.alt: Office treatment area at Hansen Orthodontics
Patient waiting area at Hansen Orthodontics
Clinical equipment and operatory at Hansen Orthodontics
Office interior showing comfortable patient spaces

paragraphs.text: Hansen Orthodontics & Aesthetics takes pride in serving the El Paso community. We focus on family-centered care and build lasting relationships through outreach, support for local events, and by being available when patients need us most. Patients frequently note how our team goes the extra mile — “Dr. Hansen went above and beyond to help us,” recalls Hannah Minall.

image.alt: Hansen Orthodontics team participating in a community event
Family enjoying time together outdoors

paragraphs.text: Use our online appointment form to request a consultation or schedule your exam. The form collects: Patient First Name*, Patient Last Name*, Patient Age (Toddler (1 - 2); Pre-Schooler (3 - 4); Child (5 - 9); Pre-Teen (10 - 12); Early-Teen (13 - 15); Late-Teen (16 - 19); Young Adult (20 - 30); Adult (31-64); Senior (65+)), Email*, Mobile Phone*, a “Please call me instead” option, How did you hear about us?*, and Question/Message*. You can also use the scheduling widget to pick a date and time and we will contact you to confirm.

Please do not submit any Protected Health Information (PHI). This is not a secure or encrypted means of communicating with our orthodontics office. By submitting you consent to receive text messages from Hansen Orthodontics & Aesthetics. Message frequency varies, message and data rates may apply. Reply STOP to opt-out; HELP for more information. View our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service: https://www.waveortho.com/privacy-policy.php and https://www.waveortho.com/terms-of-service.php. Form buttons: Submit / Reset. Confirmation: Submission Successful! Thank you for requesting an appointment! We will follow up shortly and we look forward to speaking with you!

image.alt: Parent and child checking in at dental reception
Family enjoying time together outdoors

og_meta.title: Get Started | Hansen Orthodontics & Aesthetics
og_meta.description: Request your consultation with Hansen Orthodontics & Aesthetics. Schedule an exam, complete new patient forms, or contact us at (915) 201-0881.

image.alt: Modern orthodontic office interior with welcoming reception and treatment rooms

paragraphs.text: Damon braces use a self-ligating system that reduces friction and often shortens treatment time. Patients experience fewer adjustments, easier oral hygiene, and a more comfortable path to a straighter smile.

image.alt: Close-up of Damon braces on a smiling patient

paragraphs.text: Spark clear aligners provide a discreet, comfortable way to correct crowding and spacing. Made from high-clarity material, they resist stains and are custom designed using digital scans for precise tooth movement.

image.alt: Spark clear aligners on a tray ready for placement

paragraphs.text: Phase 1, or early interceptive care, is designed for children ages six to ten to guide jaw growth, create room for permanent teeth, and prevent more complex problems later. Early appliances like expanders and space maintainers set the foundation for a healthier smile.

image.alt: Orthodontic office photo showing treatment rooms and children's area

paragraphs.text: Airway-focused treatment expands the palate and guides jaw development to improve breathing, reduce snoring, and support healthier sleep. We evaluate airway concerns alongside orthodontic goals to create a plan that improves both function and facial balance.
Improved sleep quality, reduced snoring, better daytime focus, and support for healthy facial growth in children.

image.alt: Panoramic x-ray showing jaw and airway anatomy

paragraphs.text: Patients with chronic mouth breathing, snoring, narrow arches, or sleep-disordered breathing may benefit from airway-centered orthodontics.

image.alt: Orthodontist reviewing airway imaging with a patient

paragraphs.text: We begin with a detailed consultation, photos, and scans to assess airway and jaw structure, then recommend targeted appliances or expanders when indicated.

image.alt: Orthodontic consultation using 3D imaging

paragraphs.text: Treatments are usually gentle and similar in discomfort to traditional orthodontics. Many airway improvements are non-surgical and focus on growth guidance or oral appliances.

image.alt: Orthodontic office showing comfortable treatment environment
Dr. Hansen consulting with a patient using digital imaging

paragraphs.text: Tooth contouring, or enamel sculpting, is a quick, precise way to refine tooth shape and correct small irregularities. It’s often completed in a single visit and paired with polishing for a natural, harmonious finish.

image.alt: Before and after images showing subtle tooth contouring results

paragraphs.text: We offer laser gum contouring and other conservative approaches to reduce excess gum display and balance tooth-to-gum proportions. Procedures are typically quick, performed with local anesthesia, and allow a fast recovery.

image.alt: Clinical operatory where laser gum contouring is performed

paragraphs.text: Tongue tie and lip tie release restore function and comfort at any age. Options range from a simple frenotomy for infants to laser therapy or frenuloplasty for older children and adults.
Difficulty breastfeeding, speech challenges, gaps between front teeth, limited tongue mobility, or trouble with oral hygiene may indicate a tie.

image.alt: Diagram of tongue tie anatomy

paragraphs.text: Frenotomy, frenuloplasty, or laser therapy are chosen based on age and severity. Laser therapy reduces bleeding and speeds healing for many patients.

image.alt: Clinical instruments used for minimally invasive oral procedures

paragraphs.text: Book a consultation so we can assess function, discuss options, and recommend the most comfortable, effective approach for you or your child.

image.alt: Patient consultation in orthodontic office
Patient before a tongue tie release procedure

paragraphs.text: Custom retainers preserve your results after treatment. We offer removable and fixed options along with clear guidance to keep your smile long term. Custom mouthguards protect athletes and patients who grind their teeth.

image.alt: Patient holding a custom orthodontic retainer
Family enjoying time together outdoors
